Summary Specialized in providing IT security expertise and guidance on Vulnerability Management and Risk Assessment in compliance with FISMA requirements Work Experience IT Security AnalystVulnerability Management Imitor Group Columbia MD March 2016 to Present Conduct kickoff meetings to collect system information to assist in the overall Security Assessment Process of the system Develop the Risk Management Framework RMF processes including System Categorization Security Controls Implementation Security Assessment Plan and continuous monitoring support for systems in accordance to FISMANIST guidelines Perform Security Categorization FIPS 199 Privacy Threshold Analysis PTA and EAuthentication with business owners and stakeholders Prepare the AA Assessment and Authorization packages for the approval of an ATO Document security weaknesses in the Plans of Action and Milestones POAM process for the tracking and execution of security related weaknesses and initiates corrective action Identify the Low Medium High vulnerabilities in the applications based on OWASP Top 10 Conduct risk assessments vulnerability assessments and threat analyses consistently to identify risk to the organization Evaluate and review Security Assessment deliverables including System Security Plan SSP Requirement Traceability Matrix RTM Contingency Plans CP Plans of Action and Milestones POAM Security Assessment Report SAR and Executive Summaries Utilize Vulnerability Assessment tools such as Nessus and Nmap to perform security testing and analyze the result IT Security Analyst TFM Consulting LLC Bowie MD August 2015 to February 2016 Supported System Owners and ISSO with the development of SAA documentation Compiled logs report and compare with previous logs to detect any anomalous on the network Ensured the integrity and protection of networks systems and applications by technical Documented and reported any security issues including the emerging trends Analyzed and assessed security incidents and escalate to client resources or appropriate internal teams for additional assistance Education Bachelors in Information Technology University of
